home.name: Chaowalit
home.subtitle: Tech Generalist specializing in Full-stack Development, AI Integration, and SEO. Creating innovative web solutions and data-driven insights from Bangkok, Thailand
home.aboutDescription: I'm a Tech Generalist with 3+ years of experience in full-stack development, AI integration, and SEO optimization. I specialize in building intelligent web solutions that drive business growth and deliver measurable results.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Tech Generalist with 3+ years of experience in full-stack development, AI integration, and SEO optimization. Based in Bangkok, Thailand.
about.myStoryContent1: Hello, I'm Book—a Tech Generalist specializing in website development, AI development, and SEO with strong website analysis skills. I have experience working with Shopify, React.js, Next.js, and utilizing tools like Google Analytics to analyze websites and extract insights that help clients' sites grow and reach a wider audience.
about.myStoryContent2: Additionally, I have expertise in analyzing data from various social media platforms to optimize marketing strategies for greater effectiveness. My background in electronics and data center operations has given me a unique perspective on both hardware and software solutions.
about.technicalSkillsDescription: Technologies and tools I work with regularly
about.funFactsDescription: A few things about me outside of coding

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: A collection of projects I've worked on, showcasing different technologies and approaches to problem-solving.
projects.interestedDescription: I'm always excited to work on new projects and collaborate with other developers. Let's discuss how we can bring your ideas to life!

blog.title: Blog

blog.newsletterDescription: Subscribe to my newsletter to get the latest articles and updates delivered straight to your inbox.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: I'm always interested in new opportunities, AI projects, and innovative collaborations. Based in Bangkok, Thailand. Let's discuss how we can work together!

contact.responseDescription: I typically respond to messages within 24-48 hours (Bangkok timezone UTC+7). For urgent AI or development projects, please mention it in the subject line.
